啱啱見到機電工程署請見習技術員，唔知有無Ching可以指點吓?

出面學師滿師再考入去好過啦
依家唔係以前請硬嗰種玩法喇

而家有錢有毅力都拎到牌
洗鬼去做呢d工咩
搵笨

quote.msg:
出面學師滿師再考入去好過啦

replies.msg:
如果諗住做一世政府
in見習再升到全職易好多
有幾個朋友出面做完攞曬牌 想入返政府做技工/技術員
都係請返一個 一來舊公司做d野未必係政府想要
二來你做幾年佢地已經當你做左幾十年咁
D問題比較刁鑽 如果你舊公司無接觸過
你真係未必答得出 政府其實而家請人係難入左
以前好多都係做唔惦私人工先做
而家私人工咁撚閪 好多人都想入政府

replies.msg: Congratulations on being given an interview ! Have you assigned a day for it yet? Don’t sell yourself short when you go for an interview though ! My friend who works there said the interior of the office is artistically and exquisitely designed. Her colleagues are very friendly. She earns a three hundred and ten thousand dollars per annum. She also works part time as a saleswoman. She earns a weekly wage of one thousand dollars plus a nine to twelve percent commission on the deals she makes. She’s recently been assigned to the company’s branch in Osaka with which she’s extremely pleased. I’m pleased about that too. I congratulated her for getting the promotion 😊 Just the other month, her farm in japan was assigned to her cousin while her property in Seoul was assigned to her brother. Such an amazing woman !
